Welcome to SNGCAS, Mezhuveli

Learn in a supportive environment where students can attain comprehensive growth and build lifelong connections. We, ever since our inception, have been doing our utmost to ensure that we enable each one of our students to play a dynamic role in the nation building process and the advancement of humanity.
